title: Mountain Zebra
desc: Watercolor painting of a Mountain Zebra in gray and red, imitating flames and smoke.

title: Mountain Zebra Line Art
desc: Digital line art of a Mountain Zebra.

title: Takahe
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a takahe, a flightless blue-green bird, in a dancing pose.

title: Giant Panda
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a panda sleeping on a crescent moon with 4 swords hanging below them.

title: Giant Panda Line Art
desc: Micron pen line art of a panda sleeping on a crescent moon with 4 swords hanging below them.

title: Oof
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a cute young saharan cheetah tripping and falling while running.

title: Oof Line Art
desc: Micron pen line art of a cute young saharan cheetah tripping and falling while running.

title: Philippine Eagle
desc: Watercolor portrait of a Philippine Eagle looking over its shoulder.

title: Marsican Brown Bear
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Marsican Brown Bear walking in front of the night sky with the Ursa Major constellation visible.

title: Marsican Brown Bear Line Art
desc: Micron pen line art of a Marsican Brown Bear walking in front of the night sky with the Ursa Major constellation visible.

title: Bush Dog
desc: Micron pen and watercolor portrait of a bush dog with abstract green foliage in the background.

title: Bush Dog Line Art
desc: Micron pen portrait of a bush dog.

title: MacQueen’s Bustard, Firebird
desc: Watercolor and ink painting of a firebird inspired by the MacQueen’s Bustard, a yellow, red, and orange bird on a red and black background.

title: MacQueen’s Bustard, Firebird
desc: Digital line art of a firebird inspired by the MacQueen’s Bustard.

title: Mountain Gazelle
desc: Micron pen and watercolor portrait of a Mountain Gazelle with a sunny sky in the background.

title: Mountain Gazelle Line Art
desc: Micron pen portrait of a Mountain Gazelle.

title: Sea Serpent Dreams of Flying
desc: Micron pen and watercolor scene of a sea dragon, inspired by the Galapagos marine iguana, climbing a rock spire that is being struck by lightning in a stormy sea and sky.

title: Sea Serpent Dreams of Flying Line Art
desc: Micron pen scene of a sea dragon, inspired by the Galapagos marine iguana, climbing a rock spire.

title: Pernambuco Pygmy-owl
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Pernambuco Pygmy-owl on a light branch with 8 more branches in the background and a night sky.

title: Pernambuco Pygmy-owl Line Art
desc: Micron pen drawing of a Pernambuco Pygmy-owl on a branch.

title: Conflict
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of two White-crowned Hornbills flying and arguing with 5 white branches in the background over a pink and gray sky.

title: Conflict Line Art
desc: Micron pen drawing of two White-crowned Hornbills flying and arguing with 5 branches sketched in the background.

title: Namdapha Flying Squirrel
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Namdapha Flying Squirrel climbing down a tree.

title: Namdapha Flying Squirrel Line Art
desc: Micron pen drawing of a Namdapha Flying Squirrel climbing down a tree.

title: Mexican Wolf
desc: Micron pen, ink, and watercolor of a Mexican Wolf running in front of trees and its face is a skull.

title: Mexican Wolf Line Art
desc: Micron pen, ink, and watercolor of a Mexican Wolf running in front of trees and its face is a skull.
